p_welcome: You entered via QR. Register to get a ticket.
svc_desc: A digital queue ticket will be issued for the selected service.
ticket_help: Save your ticket. When the operator calls you, go to the indicated desk.
ticket_not_found: Ticket not found. Please register again.
ticket_warning: Note: some ticket fields may be missing.
adm_desc: Choose the payment type, then choose a category.
adm_copy_hint: * Copies can be made near the technical secretary if needed.
adm_need_pay_cat: Please select payment type and category first
adm_no_desk: Desk not found. Check config rules.
